definition: having a sharp cutting edge or point, a funeral lament sung with loud wailing, express grief verbally
details:
adjective
- having a sharp cutting edge or point
= example: having a sharp cutting edge or point
- painful as if caused by a sharp instrument
= synonyms: knifelike
- very good
= synonyms: hot
- intense or sharp
= synonyms: exquisite
- having or demonstrating ability to recognize or draw fine distinctions
= synonyms: sharp
noun
- a funeral lament sung with loud wailing
verb
- express grief verbally
= synonyms: lament
